mapper.select: select * from tb_busker_show s, tb_busker b, tb_member m where s.busker_no = b.busker_no and m.member_no = b.member_no and gu = #{gu}
select * from tb_busker_show s, tb_busker b, tb_member m where s.busker_no = b.busker_no and m.member_no = b.member_no and date(enroll_date) = #{enrollDate}

select c.*,f.path,f.system_name,f.group_no from (select title,content,reg_date,board_no,is_deleted, 'q' as 'board_type',group_no from tb_qnaboard where is_deleted = 'n' union all select title,content,reg_date,board_no,is_deleted, 'f' as 'board_type',group_no from tb_freeboard where is_deleted = 'n' ) as c left outer join (select group_no,system_name,path from tb_file group by group_no) as f on c.group_no = f.group_no where title like concat('%', #{input}, '%') or content like concat('%', #{input}, '%') order by reg_date desc limit #{begin}, 10

select count(*) from (select title,content,reg_date,board_no,is_deleted, 'q' as 'board_type',group_no from tb_qnaboard where is_deleted = 'n' union all select title,content,reg_date,board_no,is_deleted, 'f' as 'board_type',group_no from tb_freeboard where is_deleted = 'n' ) as c left outer join (select group_no,system_name,path from tb_file group by group_no) as f on c.group_no = f.group_no where title like concat('%', #{input}, '%') or content like concat('%', #{input}, '%') order by reg_date desc
select m.profile_img,m.profile_img_path , b.* from tb_busker as b inner join tb_member as m on b.member_no = m.member_no where b.activity_name = #{input}
select m.profile_img,m.profile_img_path , b.* from tb_busker as b inner join tb_member as m on b.member_no = m.member_no where b.activity_name like concat ('%', #{input}, '%')
select * from tb_busker_show s, tb_busker b, tb_member m where s.busker_no = b.busker_no and m.member_no = b.member_no and show_no = #{showNo}
select * from tb_busker_show s, tb_busker b, tb_member m where s.busker_no = b.busker_no and m.member_no = b.member_no and date(enroll_date) = current_date();

select f.*, s.*, b.activity_name, m.profile_img_path, m.profile_img from tb_follow f, tb_busker_show s, tb_busker b, tb_member m where f.member_no = #{memberNo} and f.busker_no = s.busker_no and s.busker_no = b.busker_no and b.member_no = m.member_no and f.follow_status = 'y' order by s.reg_date desc;

select s.*, b.activity_name, m.profile_img_path, m.profile_img from tb_busker_show s, tb_busker b, tb_member m where s.busker_no = b.busker_no and b.member_no = m.member_no order by s.reg_date desc limit 0, 10

select * from tb_follow f, tb_artist_photo p, tb_busker b, tb_member m where f.member_no = #{memberNo} and f.busker_no = p.busker_no and p.busker_no = b.busker_no and b.member_no = m.member_no and f.follow_status = 'y' order by p.reg_date desc;
select * from tb_artist_photo p, tb_busker b, tb_member m where p.busker_no = b.busker_no and b.member_no = m.member_no order by p.reg_date desc limit 0, 10

select * from tb_follow f, tb_video v, tb_busker b, tb_member m where f.member_no = #{memberNo} and f.busker_no = v.busker_no and v.busker_no = b.busker_no and b.member_no = m.member_no and f.follow_status = 'y' order by v.reg_date desc;
select * from tb_video v, tb_busker b, tb_member m where v.busker_no = b.busker_no and b.member_no = m.member_no order by v.reg_date desc limit 0, 10
